name: 'True Friends Are Always Together In Spirit...' Friendship Print
description:
A beautiful print with a lovely quote about friendship. The perfect gift for a special friend!

This best-selling print depicts two red birds sitting in a silhouetted tree, on an eau-de-nil background. There is a white border around the image, which is helpful when framing. The quote reads "True friends are always together in spirit..."

This is the perfect gift for far-away friends. Let them know you value their friendship, even if you're unable to see each other as much as you'd like to.

Choose either a framed or unframed print.

Each unframed print comes with a card containing framing advice, as well as information about stockists of reasonably priced frames. I am very happy to advise on framing, so please do contact me if you require any assistance.

Made from:
Framed prints are mounted with an acid-free, white core mountboard, and are packaged in a double-walled corrugated box, protected with bubble wrap. Please note: framed print option is not available on international deliveries.

Frame: British-made light oak finish solid wood frame, fitted with high quality styrene/acrylic glazing. Acrylic glazing is lightweight and shatter resistant. It is optically pure, and indistinguishable from glass when on the wall.

A4 unframed prints: Giclée print on 250gsm heavyweight linen paper, packaged in a stiff cardboard backed envelope.

Dimensions:
Unframed print size: 21cm x 29.7cm

Frame dimensions (external): approximately 46cm x 36cm

Due to differences in computer monitors, printed colours may differ slightly to those shown on screen.

FREE shipping (UK Mainland addresses)

options.name: Light Oak Framed Standard A4 Print

name: 'Life Is Like A Tea Cup' Friendship Print
description:
What's better than a lovely cup of tea with a friend? This colourful graphic print celebrates life - and tea! - with a great inspirational quote.

"Life is like a tea cup - to be filled to the brim and enjoyed with friends".

Print depicts a stack of quirky tea cups in red, blue and green with the quote printed next to them. The background has an all-over pattern of stacked cups in a pale grey.

Choose either a framed or unframed print. 

Each unframed print comes with a card containing framing advice, as well as information about stockists of reasonably priced frames. I am very happy to advise on framing, so please do contact me if you require any assistance.

Frame dimensions (external): approximately 46cm x 36cm

Due to differences in computer monitors, printed colours may differ slightly to those shown on screen.

FREE Shipping (UK Mainland addresses)

name: 'When Life Hands You Lemons' Gin Print
description:
Who needs lemonade? When life hands you lemons there's only one thing to do - make a gin and tonic!

This funky graphic art print features three lemons; the bottom lemon shows the wording 'When life hands you lemons, make a gin and tonic'. The lemons are printed with a 'textured' image to enhance their look, and the print has a matching border with the same 'textured' look.

What a fun motto! The print makes a fabulous gift for any gin lover, and it's also a great print to grace any kitchen wall.

Choose either a framed or unframed print. 

Each unframed print comes with a card containing framing advice, as well as information about stockists of reasonably priced frames. I am very happy to advise on framing, so please do contact me if you require any assistance.

name: Jane Eyre 'I Am No Bird' Quote Birdcage Print
description:
A fabulous print for any literature lover, featuring an inspiring quote from 'Jane Eyre'.

The print has a pale blue background with off-white and dark blue details, and features the quote: 'I am no bird; and no net ensnares me; I am a free human being with an independent will.' This inspiring quote is from 'Jane Eyre' by Charlotte Brontë, and the print shows an open birdcage with a bird in flight.

Charlotte Brontë's 1847 novel is set in an age where women were symbolized in paintings as birds in cages; pretty things to be kept and admired.

Mr Rochester believes himself to be the master of Jane, but she resists, telling him 'I am no bird; and no net ensnares me; I am a free human being with an independent will', proclaming her free spirit and signifying her drive to remain an independent woman.

This could be the perfect inspirational gift for a friend who is newly single!

Made from:
Framed prints are mounted with an acid-free, white core mountboard, and are packaged in a double-walled corrugated box, protected with bubble wrap. Please note: framed print option is not available on international deliveries.

Frame: British-made light oak finish solid wood frame, fitted with high quality styrene/acrylic glazing. Acrylic glazing is lightweight and shatter resistant. It is optically pure, and indistinguishable from glass when on the wall.

A4 unframed print: Giclée print on 250gsm heavyweight linen paper, packaged in a stiff cardboard backed envelope.

Dimensions:
Unframed print size: 21cm x 29.7cm

Frame dimensions (external): approximately 46cm x 36cm

Due to differences in computer monitors, printed colours may differ slightly to those shown on screen.

name: 'Let's Have Some Tea' Graphic Print
description:
This best-selling print depicts an old fashioned tea kettle with a lovely quote: 'Let's have some tea and talk about happy things'. It will add a splash of sunshine to your kitchen wall! It also makes the perfect gift for a tea-loving friend.
